channel.title: Implementing an ActivityPub server in Lumen
channel.description:
I've decided to make my journey towards implementing an ActivityPub server with a web interface (and later a C5S part) public: https://notabug.org/tinyrabbit/lumen-ap-server
I'll definitely be asking questions in this forum when I run into issues or don't understand the protocol or de facto standards :D I hope you'll all help me along.

item.title: Implementing an ActivityPub server in Lumen

item.description:
